J1939 Outgoing Event Triggered Frame Page

J1939 Outgoing Event Triggered Frame contains J1939 parameters from the highlighted frame.

What do you want to do?

Delete

To delete a frame, right-click the desired frame in the configuration tree and select Delete from the shortcut menu.

Delete multiple parameters

To delete multiple parameters, right-click the desired frame in the configuration tree and select Delete Multiple Parameters from the shortcut menu.

Set software cyclic channel

By default, frames are generated when there is a value change on any parameter within that frame. To enable software cyclic frame generation, select Enable software cyclic trigger and enter the desired transmission period into Transmit Time field. Note that frames with software cyclic frame generation enabled generate if there is a value change on a contained parameter or if the period since the last generation has expired (does not maintain phase). If the frame is set to generate periodically in the imported database, these fields are automatically set to match the database.
